description: This table is used to track anesthesia supplemental unit procedures.

columns.name: TX_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the transaction record for this row.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: SERV_AREA_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the service area record for this transaction. This column is frequently used to link to the CLARITY_SA table.

columns.name: SUP_PROC_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the supplemental unit procedure. This column is frequently used to link to the CLARITY_EAP table.

columns.name: SUP_PROC_QUANTITY
columns.description: The quantity of this supplemental procedure.

columns.name: SUP_PROC_UNITS
columns.description: The number of units of this supplemental procedure.

columns.name: SUP_PROC_DESC
columns.description: The description for this supplemental procedure.
